column5: Not much of a report, too busy, but I'll post pics from the past 3 days.

RIGHT ON STEVE !!!!!  great catch man.  ..and a few real silver fish  ,man i have seen some already are very blac,nice brown too.  ..love those spots...awesome pics man,thanks for sharing steve...cheers
NIce catch. Can't wait to get my noodle rod tomorrow so I can post some pics of my own from the rivers
Those are some beautiful fish!!!
good job dude nice brown
Those are some beatiful fish
That was one beautiful brown...havent seen one like that in some time......... Thanks for sharring this with us.... You got me back to thinking when chrome was all i fished for.appreciate that.
some great fish,congrats
Some real beauties there, way to go.
Awesome!
Nice brown. What did you catch him on?
....Very nice indeed.
NICE FISH BRO!!! BEAUTY BROWNS AND SOME PRETTY BIG BOWS FOR THIS TIME OF YR!!!
Great report (and fish!!!) - the silver fish are Cohos (not steelhead).
when the water was dirty, chunks of skein, when the water cleared up, single eggs. As for spots, if you can figure it out, congratulations, if not, sorry.
Awesome pics man!!!
nice fish
that's a beauty! i wish i can find some place that nice in Hamilton so that I can catch some salmon and trout here too..
TX DAVE!!! HAD A BRAIN FART MOMENT THERE  LOL

So, do you catch only perfect, beautiful, clean fish?  LOL.  Most of mine are marked up, like they've been in a battle or something.  Great job and pics as usual.  Thanks for the report!  As for the location....hmmm....I have no freakin idea.....LOL
